title: Vehicle licensing statistics
description: Data on all licensed and registered vehicles, produced by Department for Transport.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to 'Latest vehicle licensing statistics' this will open another  page scroll down to documents  and the data can be found in a zip file
sizingNotes: 24 separate ODS spreadsheets with footnotes, it may be possible t combine into 1 dataset
notes: There was a large decrease in new vehicle registrations linked to the measures implemented towards the end of March 2020 to limit the impact of the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.
